name: minio-access-management
description: Complete MinIO access management system with admin UI, file UI, and invitation system

scripts.test-unit: npm run test --prefix admin-api && npm run test --prefix file-api
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting all projects...' && cd admin-api && npm run lint && cd ../file-api && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.install-all: cd admin-api && npm install && cd ../file-api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: MinIO Access Team
